It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. Page to lead Google; roles clarified Larry Page, who co-founded Google with Sergey Brin , will be the U.S. search-engine giant's chief executive officer in April, the company announced Thursday. In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly, Eric Schmidt , the company's current CEO, said in a blog posted on Google's Web site.
